newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Third party interested in Jinhui stake.
newsitem.headline: Third party interested in Jinhui stake.

text.p: Jinhui Holdings Co Ltd said on Tuesday that an independent third party had expressed an interest in buying all or part of Fairline Consultants Ltd's 61.95 percent stake in the company.

"Negotiations, which are currently only at a preliminary stage, if materialised may result in the prospective purchaser having to make a general offer for the shares of the company," Jinhui said in a statement.
Fairline is controlled by Jinhui chairman Ng Siu Fai and executive director Thomas Ng.
Jinhui shares closed at HK$1.84 on Monday.
